column4: Can someone please answer my question for the Fourth time now
> http://www.ubuntu.com/desktop/get-ubuntu/windows-installer -- it says its safe but i hear bad things about it -- when they updated it did they fix those problems?
Please don't flood, use http://paste.ubuntu.com to paste, don't use Enter as punctuation.
